text: new subdivision vaccination mandates amend rsa by inserting after section the following new subdivision vaccination mandates vaccination mandates an employee who is terminated placed on leave or given zero hours of billable time for noncompliance with an vaccination requirement shall have the right to an additional months of standard unemployment benefits under rsa beyond the maximum duration or benefit amount payable by the employer or the department of unemployment security an expedited court hearing which shall occur not more than days after the filing of a claim under this subdivision recover court costs and legal fees incurred in enforcing this subdivision
